title: Issue while selecting champion
body: there are times that when selecting a champion in in either rank or draft pick where an error happens preventing me from either selecting a champion or it doesn't show me that its my turn to pick. even though i couldn't select my character because of an error happening from the client i'm forced to wait for the dodge timer.

replies.body:
Today this issue occours on my client too,two times on two different ip network! Now i am penalised with 30 minutes because i could not pick or even select my champion on ranked!
Also I didn't had any other program open,only the game! I added a print -> http://imgur.com/a/ac6Uc

That sucks to hear, sorry if it caused a dodge.  :/  I'd like to help figure this out though.  What exactly is the error you're getting?  Are you also running any third party programs that interact with League?  If so, disable that as well and get back to me!
